original_text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day that I took them by the hand to bring them out of the land of Egypt; which my covenant they brake, although I was an husband unto them, saith the Lord:
korean_text: 이 언약은 내가 그들의 조상들의 손을 잡고 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내던 날에 맺은 것과 같지 아니할 것은 내가 그들의 남편이 되었어도 그들이 내 언약을 깨뜨렸음이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: that I made with their fathers
in the day that I took them by the hand
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들의 손을 잡았던 그 날에

sentences.original_text: to bring them out of the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 이집트 땅에서 인도해 내기 위해

sentences.original_text: although I was an husband unto them
